subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic racked up 18 winners on his backhand to Roger Federer’s 4 and kept his concentration in the decisive fifth set to win his second Wimbledon men’s singles title on Sunday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic racked up 18 winners on his backhand to Roger Federer’s 4 and kept his concentration in the decisive fifth set to win his second Wimbledon men’s singles title on Sunday.
